Name: Apicurio
Text: You been causing problems again, Symmantis? Looks like my warning didn't get through your thick skull last time!

Name: Symmantis
Text: I saw desserts; I'd no lemons, alas no melon. Distressed was I.

Name: Apicurio
Text: I'm not interested in wasting any more words on you. Prepare yourself!
